ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: In that case I would clearly be misguided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: In that case I would surely be in clear error.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely in that case I should indeed be in evident error.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Had I worshipped things besides God, I would have been in manifest error).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Undoubtedly, I am then in open error.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then verily, I should be in plain error."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: In that case I shall most surely be in clear error:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely in that case I should be in manifest error.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then truly I should be in error manifest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: In that case I should indeed be in manifest error.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily then I should be in error manifest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed, then I would be in manifest error.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: I would indeed, if I were to do so, be in manifest Error.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then verily, I should be in plain error.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Surely, I should then be in clear error.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: In that case, I would be completely lost.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, I would then be in manifest error.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [36:24] Truly then, in other words, in the case of me worshipping [gods] other than God, I would be in manifest error.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then truly I should be in error manifest) if I worship anything besides Allah.
